extendedInfo.description: Explore the universe like never before in this spacey, tilty adventure!PRESS AND REVIEWS- "Pick-up and play simplicity. Rating: 4/5" - Appspy.com- "Highly recommended to casual gamers." - Appmodo.com- "Beautiful graphics, awesome sound effects... it will keep you glued to your device for hours and hours, really challenging." - Appbuddy.com- "Seriously awesome... a level of detail you wouldn't expect from a mobile game." - Toucharcade.com Forum UsersTHE SPACE BUNNIES NEED YOUR HELP!Their worlds are deteriorating and there's only one place left to go... the Homeworld. Blast off on an exciting adventure to help the Space Bunnies find home - but don't forget to pick up their friends along the way!THE FINAL FURRY FRONTIERRocket your way through unique obstacles like asteroid belts, wormholes, galaxies and black holes. Avoid the space stickies who want nothing more than to feed on your rocket fuel. And watch out for the bunnies natural enemy, the SPACE FOX!FEATURES- Casual and fun gameplay like no other- HD graphics for phones and tablets, including the Galaxy Tab, Motorola Xoom and other Android 3.0 (Honeycomb) tablets- Innovative yet simple tilt controls let you zoom through space like never before- Massive levels to explore with tons of unique obstacles and puzzles- Special powers and pickups to help clear your way home- Calibrate to play in any orientation, landscape or portrait- Pinch to zoom, gestures, and tap controls make it easy to navigate space and blow things up- Addictive replayability - explore the corners of space you missed before to find all your long-eared friends** It's the YEAR OF THE BUNNY, and the Space Bunnies need your help! Get them home! **

reviews.title: N
reviews.comment: Like the idea of the game...but I don\'t know if its just me but it seems really hard to control
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The touch issue has been remedied in Nexus One but it gets laggyonce in awhile and one gripe- please add a menu to pause/go back/exit!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Umm, doesn\'t work..
reviews.comment: This doesn\'t even work on my HTC One S running Android 4.0.4. Whenever I open the app it just shows a white screen and then closes the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on my galaxy tab 2 10.1
reviews.comment: Gravity is always 90 degrees off, even when trying to calibrate. To add insult to injury, I thought I would visit their website to seek help, but their website won\'t even display on my tab. I get the impression these guys don\'t understand tablets.
reviews.author: Dan Surratt

reviews.title: Cool arcade style game.
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun game, but a little confusing at first. I didn\'t realize phone tilt was part of the movement.
reviews.author: Abe Cline

reviews.title: What a great game,you\'ve got to love it :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool idea but needs tuning
reviews.comment: Really hard to play on my galaxy note, gravity Is too strong and the ufo flies too fast
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very beautiful and fresh game like a chewing gum ^_^
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t work
reviews.comment: Don\'t work..... wast of time freezes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It just doesn\'t save...really fun game but pls fix this ASAP. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great and fine on my galaxy tab 7\" high production values
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working.
reviews.comment: It\'s not working on HTC one s. Plz fix.

reviews.title: SGSII
reviews.comment: Thought this game would be a physics based gravity game, sadly its not.
reviews.author: Garrett Groce

reviews.title: AMAZING  !
reviews.comment: Fresh cool  graphics.  The tilt feature means I can  control it with one hand  while on dialysis. 6  Stars.

reviews.comment: I didnt understand the game at all it wasnt ti fun either:( the title is cool though.

reviews.comment: Ok i guess. Controles kinda suck

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: We should have the option to take it off the tilt feature

reviews.comment: Fun but how do you steer this crazy thing?!?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: How the heck do you start?! I touch the planet and nothing happens!? Be nice if I could try it out.
